timeline.message: Change version number from Integer to Long

timeline.bodyText: Make sure to check context for null on the calling function to avoid NPE when doing addData
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Does withContext guarantee context to be not null?
replies.author: YijunXieMS

replies.bodyText: In some cases, we end up calling this from the sync client and hence the context could be null. Need a check there when passing.
replies.author: samvaity

timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: I put the two placeholder separately. After placeholder replacement, whatever in the request headers will be put into the body eventually. There won't be two in the header has just one.
replies.author: YijunXieMS

timeline.bodyText: Add this to the Constants file where the value is declared.
timeline.author: samvaity
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -33,6 +36,9 @@ private final EventGridServiceVersion serviceVersion; + // Please see here + // for more information on Azure resource provider namespaces. +

replies.bodyText: I copied the value there but didn't copy the comment ;-(. Corrected.
replies.author: YijunXieMS

timeline.bodyText: We shouldn't manually be updating a generated file?
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: This change is because the swagger is changed and code is re-generated. Not a manual change.
replies.author: YijunXieMS

timeline.bodyText: Not sure how this resource provide namespace link is relevant to the constructor.
timeline.author: srnagar
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -33,6 +36,9 @@ private final EventGridServiceVersion serviceVersion; + // Please see here + // for more information on Azure resource provider namespaces.

replies.bodyText: It's for a constant, which is copied to Constants.java but I didn't copy this together. Good catch.
replies.author: YijunXieMS

timeline.bodyText: Should have a null check for context before using it.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText:
This internal api is called by a public API, which calls FluxUtil.withContext to create a Context. So I assume the context won't be null.
In debugging, I see it's an empty Context instance instead of null.
replies.author: YijunXieMS
srnagar

timeline.bodyText: events can be null since the public APIs don't seem to check. It might be better to have the null check and include an error message to indicate that events cannot be null.
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Added null check like in EventHubs
replies.author: YijunXieMS

timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: Can the Flux stream have strings that are split across multiple ByteBuffer boundaries?
timeline.author: srnagar

replies.bodyText: Changed to use a StringBuilder to take everything from the Flux. Good question.
replies.author: YijunXieMS

timeline.bodyText: It is not very clear why we are replacing the trace names. It might be good to add some documentation for this method.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: I think my comment about user passing null for context applies to this method.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText:
Do we want the request headers to have the keys of tracestate and traceparent with empty values ?

traceparentHeader != null
? String.format(","%s":"%s"", Constants.TRACE_PARENT, traceparentHeader.getValue())
: "")

I think we should skip updating the key value if traceparentHeader == null.
timeline.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Clarified offline, this is not updating the request headers.
replies.author: samvaity
